creator: Gary Trafford
descriptionHtml:
Board Record records your board game plays and tracks scores, play duration, players, location and other interesting bits of info about your play sessions.

• Create custom scoresheets for each game to break down scores by round or score category.
• Set game specific tags to define how a game was won or lost.
• Record teams, player roles and location.
• Record which expansions or add-ons were used in a particular play.
• Use the built in tool to randomly pick a start player and then view stats such as how often the start player wins.
• Use the Game Picker tool when you can't decide what to play. Filter the options by player count, play duration and game type.
• Sync your plays and collection with BoardGameGeek.
• Import existing data from BoardGameGeek or BG Stats.

View a variety of interesting statistics from you play data.

• High, average and low scores of total scores and per round/score category.
• Average play duration.
• Expansion plays.
• Win % and score by role.
• Tag usage.
• Filter stats by tags and expansions.
• View your H-Index and which games to play next to increase it.

Board Record Premium

Board Record Premium is a once off payment to remove ads and unlock additional features. It will be the only payment you ever have to make for Board Record. Any and all current and future premium features will be included.

• Remove Ads
• More Game Picker filters
• Filter game stats by tags
• Unlock additional stat filters
• Player groups

To Come

• Share plays with other users
descriptionShort: Record your board game plays and collect interesting statistics.

Permission denied errors are now handled better
Fixed a bug where score from BGG import wasn't being correctly parsed

• Use the Game Picker tool when you can't decide what to play. Filter the options by player count, play duration and game type.
• Vote on games to give the random picker weightings.
• Sync your plays and collection with BoardGameGeek.
• Import existing data from BoardGameGeek or BG Stats.
• Import existing data from ScorePal including plays and scoresheets.
• Share your plays with your friends.

View a variety of interesting statistics from you play data.

• High, average and low scores of total scores and per round/score category.
• View stats for advanced scoring options such as win conditions and toggles
• Average play duration.
• Expansion plays.
• Win % and score by role.
• Tag usage.
• Filter stats by tags, expansions and more.
• View your H-Index and which games to play next to increase it.

Board Record Premium is a once off payment to remove ads and unlock additional features. It will be the only payment you ever have to make for Board Record. Any and all current and future premium features will be included.
